description: This Dart source file defines the SettingsProvider class, which manages UI preferences such as theme mode, layout, and sorting method. It interacts with a SettingsRepository to persist and load user preferences, and notifies listeners of changes.

classes.name: SettingsProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that manages UI settings such as theme mode, layout, and sorting. It loads preferences from a repository and notifies listeners when changes are made.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the theme mode, layout, and sort settings from the repository and updates the provider's state.

methods.name: setThemeMode
methods.description: Sets the theme mode, updates the state, notifies listeners, and persists the change via the repository.

methods.name: setLayout
methods.description: Sets the layout preference, updates the state, notifies listeners, and persists the change via the repository.

methods.name: setSort
methods.description: Sets the sorting preference, updates the state, notifies listeners, and persists the change via the repository.
